title: Kime Koi!

synonyms: Kimekoi! Takane no Hana to Osananajimi ga Kimatta Riyuu
alternative_titles.en: Kimekoi! - Love Decision! The Reason Why I'm Going after a Girl Out of My League and My Childhood Friend

synopsis: Hero Hajime is going to school with Misa and Megumi. He loves Megumi, and asks Misa if there is a way to win Megumi over. Misa produces a pill that is supposed to make the taker reveal their exact feelings for someone. It turns out Megumi has been wanting Hajime, but so has Misa.
